attributes.action: ban the use of cars or other personal motorised transport for one day a month to reduce environmental pollution and encourage people to walk or bicycle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world would be a much nicer place if, for just one day a month, there were no cars on the roads. Just imagine the peace! Those who want to travel could use public transport, walk or bicycle. There would be an immediate reduction in CO2 emissions from cars of approximately 1/30th, which can't be bad, and we would all be forced to take more exercise.
